fields.Label: Business Cards
fields.Description:
Business cards, RUSH options:

Next day business cards and overnight business cards

  • Order business cards today and have them tomorrow.
  • Pick up your next day business cards at our 38th Street location in Midtown Manhattan.
  • We can also deliver your business cards by messenger or courier service the day they are printed anywhere in Manhattan.
  • Wait an additional one or two business days and save on cost.

Manhattan business cards are printed on our high-quality digital presses with rush turnaround for your important meeting, presentation, seminar or conference or trade show.

Business card orders placed by 4:00 pm EST any day Monday through Friday will be available for pickup the Next Business Day at 4:00 pm EST Monday through Friday (excluding Holidays).

Please note: If a PDF proof is requested for a Next Business day order, it will delay the job by one business day.

Business cards, NON-RUSH options:

High quality printed business cards will make a lasting impression on your New York City clients and prospects.

Quality:

  • NOT your "typical" online, mass-produced business cards.
  • Skilled prepress professionals will take great care to make sure your business cards will look professional and portray you and your business as an industry-leading company.
  • Our high-quality offset printed full-color beautiful business cards are available online in thicknesses ranging from 12pt. to very thick and luxurious 32pt.
  • Non-rush cards are printed on our high-quality offset presses.

Paper stock options:

  • Linen
  • Satin
  • Dull Coated / Silk
  • Uncoated
  • Super Shiny
  • Velvet / Suede
  • Other custom papers are available offline.

Come in or contact us for even more customized lux printing and paper options to make a unique card that will make you stand out from your competitors.

Choose an option to get started:

  1. Upload your own business card design.
  2. Order online and use our award-winning online business card designer.
  3. Visit us so we can discuss a design that will work best for you. 
    • If you already have a design we can usually edit your existing business card design and edit the name, title, phone number, emails, etc. and send you a PDF proof to review before we print your cards.

Come in for a free consultation about your business card design and to see and touch paper options. Visit us in Manhattan at our 252 West 38th Street location, New York, NY 10018. We not only offer online pricing and convenience, but one of the things that make us special is that we are also available in person too!

Standard US size business cards are 3.5" x 2"  (88.9mm x 50.8mm) Our thick 16pt. paper option is equivalent to 379 GSM.

3.375" x 2.125" (85.7mm x 54mm) European size business cards and credit card size business cards are also available on our website.

fields.Label: Edge Painted Business Cards
fields.Description:
Edge Painted Business Cards

Edge painted business cards are stunning keepsakes.

Impressive Edge Painted Premium Business Cards add an accent color to the sides of your full-color business cards. Our ultra-thick, color accented, business cards will get your clients attention and ensure they retain your business card!

Colored edge business cards demonstrate to your prospects and customers that both your creativity and attention to detail extend beneath the surface.

Our painted edge business cards are printed with the highest quality craftsmanship and allow you in make a first class impression.

Choose from a variety of exciting colors:

Black painted edges, Metallic Blue painted edges, Metallic Gold painted edges, Metallic Green painted edge, Metallic Hot Pink painted edges or Metallic Purple painted edges.

When you hand out your color edge painted business cards to current and future clients, your card will be of distinction. Just like the product or service you offer.

Edge painting on thick 36pt. rigid paper is bold and imaginative, just like you.
Order Your Unique, Thick, Impressive painted color edged business cards NOW!

Edge painted business cards are sometimes called faux gilding, edge tinting or edge inking.

Custom color painted edges to match your brand colors are available for an additional charge.

Design your own custom business cards online or visit us in Manhattan on 38th Street for a FREE consultation!

Need a reorder or your existing business cards or have or any other questions? Visit us today in Manhattan for a free consultation or if you are outside New York, call 212-989-6633, email or chat with us online.

If you are a large corporate account and order many sets of business cards, please call for a quote.

fields.Label: Foil Business Cards
fields.Description:
FOIL BUSINESS CARDS.

Create a memorable first impression with our luxurious soft velvet, scuff resistant Gold Foil Business Cards or Silver Foil Business Cards or our Holographic Foil Business Cards.

With our Embossed Style Raised Foil business cards, you can choose from stunning gold foil business cards, silver foil business or our holographic foil business cards. With all of them, you can both see and feel raise coming off the card.

We combine the highest quality, full-color printing with the newest highest quality foil embossed printing technology to produce spectacular looking raised foil business cards you can feel.

Outstanding, high-quality foil business cards at remarkably a low price.

  • On-site design services. Let us provide you with a professional design.
  • Ultra high-end branding at a very affordable price
  • FREE consultations
  • Midtown Manhattan location

Designer hint: Black business cards with embossed 3D foil make your brand look so sheik! You must see and feel these foil cards for yourself.

We invite you to come by and visit us at our 38th Street location to touch and feel this outstanding business card. Can't make it in? Request FREE SAMPLES below.

Order online or come in and have us design your foil business card.

We offer traditional hot foil stamping on Cranes 100% cotton thick papers. Come in for a free consultation. Visit us in Manhattan at our 252 West 38th Street location, New York, NY 10018.

If you outside the tri-state area or are unable to come in, click the link below to order samples:

fields.Description:

Create a memorable first impression with our luxurious soft velvet, scuff resistant Embossed Style Raised Spot UV Business cards.

With our Embossed Style Raised business cards, you can both see and feel raised logo or text on the card.

Outstanding, high-quality embossed style business cards at remarkably a low price.

  • On-site design services. Let us provide you with a professional design.
  • Ultra high-end branding at a very affordable price
  • FREE consultations
  • Midtown Manhattan location

fields.Label: Pantone Business Cards
fields.Description:
Pantone color business card printing is also known as Solid color Pantone business card printing and is required when specific Pantone colors are specified for your brand or when color requirements fall outside the Full Color or CMYK color gamut range.

For example, bright oranges and specific blue colors cannot be reproduced using CMYK or full-color printing. This is when Solid color printing also known as Spot color printing might be required.

Order multiple names at the same time and save!

Order 2-3 names at the same time and save 25%. At checkout use coupon code: "pantonebc25"

Order 4-9 names at the same time and save 35%. At checkout use coupon code: "pantonebc35"

Order 10-15 names at the same time and save 45%. At checkout use coupon code: "pantonebc45"

We offer most Mohawk brand paper and Neenah brand paper options for Pantone color printing.

Please visit us at 38th Street or email us your design if you would like to discuss your project.

Custom size Pantone business cards are also available. Contact us for a quote.

We also offer Classic Crest Solar White Paper in 165lb DT (double thick) Smooth cover. It is Carbon Neutral, Elemental Chlorine Free, FSC Certified, Green-e Certification, Lignin Free, and Made Using Wind Power.

Pricing does not apply for business cards with heavy ink coverage (ink coverage of over 30%) or metallic and fluorescent inks. Please contact us for a quote before ordering, if you have any questions.

fields.Label: Plastic Business Cards
fields.Description:
Plastic Business Cards are extremely durable. They don't tear or get "dog earred" (you know, when the tips of the corners start to curl) as paper business cards often do. They are even waterproof!

Plastic Business Cards are available in either white plastic, clear plastic or frosted plastic in either standard plastic business card size of 3.5" x 2" or plastic credit card size of 3.375" x 2.125".

30 pt. plastic (credit card thickness) business cards and even thicker are available for an additional cost. 

Rush service is available for our 30pt. thick plastic business card option.

All plastic business cards come with either 1/4" x 1/8" round corner options. Click here for a diagram.

Have or any other questions? Visit us today in Manhattan for a free consultation or if you are outside New York, call 212-989-6633, email or chat with us online.

fields.Label: Raised Ink Business Cards
fields.Description:
Raised business cards

Raised ink business cards also known as Thermography business cards convey a professional, prestigious impression. We print on non-plastic feeling uncoated papers to give your cards a traditional feel and style.

Design your raised print card online, upload your files to print or have us create a beautiful raised printed design for you.

You can even mail us your existing raised printed business card and we will update the names and phone numbers and send you PDF proofs to review before we print.

Special Offer:
FREE UPS Ground SHIPPING anywhere in the U.S. on all Traditional Raised Business Cards (Please select UPS Ground and then enter coupon code "freeship20" at checkout).

Add impact with custom raised ink business cards.  Raised ink business cards are achieved through a traditional printing process known as thermography.  A clear powder resin is placed on wet ink and then heated to produce the "raised effect". We combine this traditional process with modern full-color printing technology to deliver multiple colors on your business card at a very affordable price.

  • We utilize the newest full-color printing technology to place an unlimited number of ink colors on the front and on the back of your raised business cards, for one low price.
  • No more one and two colors raised business cards limiting your creativity. Print as many logos and colors as you like on your business card for the same low price. Of course, we continue to offer black ink raised business cards, if you prefer a more traditional business image.
  • We offer white, cream (natural) color paper and Linen business card paper online.
 

 

Need a reorder or your existing raised business cards or have or any other questions? Visit us today in Manhattan for a free consultation or if you are outside New York, call 212-989-6633, email or chat with us online.

Solid Pantone color raised business cards also known spot color Pantone raised business cards are also available. Need more cards that you originally ordered from another printer? We can recreate or edit your existing design.

If you are a large corporate account and order many sets of business cards, please call for a quote for special discounted pricing on all your raised printing business cards and stationery.

Note: When printing full-color thermography business cards, light ink colors have less ink and therefore the raised effect is less noticeable. Darker colors provide the best raise on full-color thermography business cards.
